bioAsHtml: Polymorphic developer in various software companies for more than twenty years. Now working at EasyMile on autonomous vehicles and fleet management. Fond of functional programming before it was cool. Curious of language implementations. Interested in systems nuts and bolts... especially if they are distributed.
